page.title: 14"The Grey Bull" Pub
page.content: The Grey Bull is 200 years old,and the building has always been used as a pub.It is owned by John Tom Bell Cruddas.And he has been there for 25 years.The pub opens in the morning from 11 o'clock till 3 o'clock.Then in the evening it is open at 5:30pm till 10:30pm. The pub sells beer, spirits, pop, tobacco, crisps, mussels, nuts and pickled eggs. Some of the prices are: Pop 20p, Beer 68p, Whiskey 60p and Lager 74p.The most popular drinks are Beer and Lager. People go to the pub to have a drink and have a chat. There are games to play like darts,dominoes and cards. Up to 30-40 people use the pub each day.There are four helpers at the pub.Mr.Cruddas does not know why it is called"The Grey Bull."
